verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
1 verse:
With this heart open wide from the depths, from the heights
I will bring a sacrifice
With these hands lifted high Hear my song, hear my cry
I will bring a sacrifice
I will bring a sacrifice

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
I Lay me down I'm not my own, I belong to you alone
Lay me down, lay me down,
Hand on my heart this much is true there's no life apart from you
Lay me down, lay me down

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
2 verse:
Letting go of my pride giving up all my rights
Take this life and let it shine, shine, shine
Take this life and let it shine

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge:
It will be my joy to say, Your will your way
It will be my joy to say, Your will your way
It will be my joy to say, Your will your way always
